# Number of events 26

event = {
	id = 92000000
	random = no
	country = GER
	
	name = "The Wehrmacht putsch"
	desc = "At Berlin the Senate is in total chaos between the different nazi positions, the Wehrmact decide to made a coup to restore order and stability. The military Junta will be compose by many famous General of WW2"
	
	style = 2
	picture = "fatherland\wehrmacht_germany"
	
	action = {
		name = "Order and stability"
		command = { type = dissent value = -3 }

		command = { type = set_domestic which = democratic value = 8 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = political_left value = 3 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = free_market value = 5 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = freedom value = 4 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = professional_army value = 5 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = defense_lobby value = 5 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = interventionism value = 3 }
		
		command = { type = chiefofarmy which = 273 } #Rommel		
	}
}

# New Constitution
event = {
	id = 92000001
	random = no
	country = GER	

	decision = {
		event = 92000000 #Military Junta
	}

	decision_trigger = {
		event = 92000000 #Military Junta
		event = 90000556 #Peace in the Reich
		flag = MilGermany
	}

	trigger = {
		event = 92000000 #Military Junta
		event = 90000556 #Peace in the Reich
		flag = MilGermany
	}
	
	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1951 }
	offset = 30
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

	name = "New State form"
	desc = "We need to take a decision about our State form : we could stay with the old System (with a chancellor and a prime minister) or made a complete revision of Reich"
	style = 2
	picture = "fatherland\wehrmacht_germany"
	decision_picture = "fatherland\decision_wehrmacht_color"

	action = {
		name = "We don't need a new State form"
		ai_chance = 0
		command = { type = dissent value = -1 }
		#command = { type = flag_ext where = GER which = _WER }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = democratic value = 7 }
	}

	action = {
		name = "We need a new State form"
		ai_chance = 100
		command = { type = dissent value = -1 }
		#command = { type = flag_ext where = GER which = _WER }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = democratic value = 4 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = political_left value = 3 }
		command = { type = event which = 92000009 where = GER when = 3 }
		}
    }

event = {
	id = 92000009 
	random = no
	country = GER
	style = 2

    name = "The new State form"
    desc = ""
   	picture = "fatherland\wehrmacht_germany"

	action = {
	     name = "Willhem III back in Germany and will be restored the German Empire"
		 ai_chance = 15
		 command = { type = name where = -1 which = "German Empire" }
		 command = { type = flag_ext where = GER which = _WER }
		 command = { type = dissent value = -1 }
		 
		 command = { type = headofstate which = 18 } #Whillem III
		 command = { type = headofgovernment which = 29 } #Goerdeler
		 
		 command = { type = sleepminister which = 14 }
         command = { type = sleepminister which = 15 } #Beck
         command = { type = sleepminister which = 16 }
         command = { type = sleepminister which = 19 } #Heuss
         command = { type = sleepminister which = 20 }
		 
		 command = { type = relation which = SOV value = -50 }
		 command = { type = relation which = USA value = -10 }
		 command = { type = relation which = ENG value = 15 }
		 command = { type = relation which = ROM value = 25 }
		 command = { type = relation which = HUN value = 25 }
		 command = { type = relation which = BUL value = 25 }
		 
		 command = { type = sleepevent which = 92000005 } #Presidential Election 1954
         command = { type = sleepevent which = 92000008 } #Presidential Election 1962
         command = { type = sleepevent which = 9876530 } #Constitutional Reform         

		command = { type = set_domestic which = democratic value = 7 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = political_left value = 3 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = free_market value = 5 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = freedom value = 4 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = professional_army value = 1 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = defense_lobby value = 3 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = interventionism value = 1 }
		 
		 command = { type = setflag which = ImperialGermany }
		 
		 }

	action = {
         name = "Maintain the status quo. We'll decide a new system in a near future"
         ai_chance = 75
         
		 command = { type = name where = -1 which = "Germany" }		 		
		 command = { type = flag_ext where = GER which = _WER }
		 command = { type = dissent value = -3 }
		 
 		 command = { type = headofstate which = 15 } #Beck
		 command = { type = headofgovernment which = 29 } #Goerdeler

		 command = { type = sleepminister which = 14 }         
         command = { type = sleepminister which = 16 }
         command = { type = sleepminister which = 17 }
         command = { type = sleepminister which = 18 }		 
         command = { type = sleepminister which = 19 } #Heuss
         command = { type = sleepminister which = 20 }

         command = { type = relation which = SOV value = -50 }
		 command = { type = relation which = USA value = -10 }
		 command = { type = relation which = ENG value = 25 }
		 command = { type = relation which = ROM value = 25 }
		 command = { type = relation which = HUN value = 25 }
		 command = { type = relation which = BUL value = 25 }
		 
		 command = { type = sleepevent which = 92000005 } #Presidential Election 1954
         command = { type = sleepevent which = 92000008 } #Presidential Election 1962
		 
 		command = { type = set_domestic which = democratic value = 8 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = political_left value = 3 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = free_market value = 5 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = freedom value = 4 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = professional_army value = 5 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = defense_lobby value = 5 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = interventionism value = 3 }
		 
		 command = { type = setflag which = JuntaGermany }
    }

    action = {
         name = "Turn back to a republican system with a new constitution"
         ai_chance = 10

		 command = { type = name where = -1 which = "German Republic" }		 		
		 command = { type = flag_ext where = GER which = _weimar }
		 command = { type = dissent value = 10 }

		 command = { type = headofstate which = 19 } #Heuss
		 command = { type = headofgovernment which = 29 }		 
		 
		 command = { type = sleepminister which = 14 }
         command = { type = sleepminister which = 15 } #Beck
         command = { type = sleepminister which = 16 }         
         command = { type = sleepminister which = 20 }

         command = { type = relation which = SOV value = -50 }
		 command = { type = relation which = USA value = -10 }
		 command = { type = relation which = ENG value = 25 }
		 command = { type = relation which = ROM value = 25 }
		 command = { type = relation which = HUN value = 25 }
		 command = { type = relation which = BUL value = 25 }		 
		 
 		command = { type = set_domestic which = democratic value = 9 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = political_left value = 5 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = free_market value = 10 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = freedom value = 10 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = professional_army value = 1 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = defense_lobby value = 1 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = interventionism value = 3 }

		 
		 command = { type = setflag which = OldGermany }
	}
}

# Electoral Reform
event = {
	id = 92000002
	random = no
	country = GER
	trigger = {
		event = 92000000 #Military Junta
		OR = {
			flag = ImperialGermany
			flag = JuntaGermany
			flag = OldGermany
		}
	}
	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1951 }
	offset = 30
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

	name = "Electoral Reform"
	desc = "The proportional voting system used in Germany allowed very small parties to gain a foothold in parliament and forced coalition government between three or more parties. The main parties agreed a deal to reform the constitution and bring in the Mixed Member proportional system. Included was a 5% rule, which required a party to win 5% of the national vote in order to claim any seats in parliament. This made the country less democratic but made strong, stable two-party government possible."
	style = 2
	picture = "fatherland\wehrmacht_germany"
	action = {
		name = "Completed"
		command = { type = dissent value = -1 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = democratic value = 9 }
	}
}

# A Faith United
event = {
	id = 92000003
	random = no
	country = GER
	trigger = {
			event = 92000000 #Military Junta
			OR = {
				flag = ImperialGermany
				flag = JuntaGermany
				flag = OldGermany
			}						
	}

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1951 }
	offset = 30
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

	name = "A new Constitution"
	desc = "The right-wing DNVP has remained the party of traditional german values. Two new parties are allowed, the unification of the liberals under the FDP presented a precedent to follow and so Zentrum merged to form the CDU (Christian Deomcratic Union) as a unified party of Christian conservatism."

	style = 2
	picture = "fatherland\wehrmacht_germany"
	action = {
		name = "Super!"
		command = { type = dissent value = -1 }
		}
}

# Liberal Merger
event = {
	id = 92000004
	random = no
	country = GER
	trigger = {
			event = 92000000 #Military Junta
			OR = {
				flag = ImperialGermany
				flag = JuntaGermany
				flag = OldGermany
			}									
	}

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1951 }
	offset = 30
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

	name = "The Liberal Merger"
	desc = "Germany's two liberal parties, the centre-left DDP and centre-right DVP, had served as the junior partners in a variety of coalition governments for many years. Tired of playing second fiddle, they decided to merge to form the FDP (Free Democratic Party). A unified liberal party could potentially become a major force in German politics."
	style = 2
	picture = "fatherland\wehrmacht_germany"
	action = {
		name = "Excellent"
		command = { type = dissent value = -1 }
		}
}

# Presidential Election 1954
event = {
	id = 92000005
	random = no
	country = GER
	date = { day = 10 month = august year = 1956 }
	name = "Presidential Election 1954"
	desc = "The role of President was a ceremonial one, although he did have the power to rule by decree in an emergency. The election of a president opposed to the ruling government could force a change of ministers in order to bring them more into line with the president's ideology."
	style = 2
	picture = "Reichstag"
	trigger = {
			event = 92000000 #Military Junta
	}
	action = {
		name = "Elect FDP candidate"
		ai_chance = 60
		command = { type = dissent value = -3 }
		command = { type = headofstate which = 630051 }
		}
	action = {
		name = "Elect CDU candidate"
		ai_chance = 40
		command = { type = dissent value = -3 }
      		command = { type = domestic which = political_left value = -1 }
		command = { type = headofstate which = 630041 }
		}
}
# Reichstag Elections: 1957
event = {
	id = 92000006
	random = no
	country = GER
	date = { day = 1 month = march year = 1957 }
	name = "Reichstag Election 1957"
	desc = "The voting system ensures that the two main parties, the SPD and CDU, will secure a large number of seats. The FDP is the only crediable alternative, so a decent share of the vote for them is also likely. Both the SPD and CDU will be trying to convince the liberals to join them in coalition."
	style = 2
	picture = "Reichstag"
	trigger = {
			event = 92000000 #Military Junta
	}

	action = {
		name = "Elect FDP coalition"
		ai_chance = 50
		command = { type = dissent value = -3 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = democratic value = 8 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = political_left value = 8 }
		command = { type = headofgovernment which = 630043 }
		command = { type = foreignminister which = 630015 }
		command = { type = armamentminister which = 630081 }
		command = { type = ministerofsecurity which = 630050 }
		command = { type = ministerofintelligence which = 630028 }
		}
	action = {
		name = "Elect CDU coalition"
		ai_chance = 50
		command = { type = dissent value = -3 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = democratic value = 8 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = political_left value = 3 }
		command = { type = headofgovernment which = 630002 }
		command = { type = foreignminister which = 630013 }
		command = { type = armamentminister which = 630078 }
		command = { type = ministerofsecurity which = 630040 }
		command = { type = ministerofintelligence which = 630029 }
		}
}
# Reichstag Elections: 1961
event = {
	id = 92000007
	random = no
	country = GER
	date = { day = 1 month = march year = 1961 }
	name = "Reichstag Election 1961"
	desc = "The voting system ensures that the two main parties, the SPD and CDU, will secure a large number of seats. The FDP is the only crediable alternative, so a decent share of the vote for them is also likely. Both the SPD and CDU will be trying to convince the liberals to join them in coalition."
	style = 2
	picture = "Reichstag"
	trigger = {
			event = 92000000 #Military Junta
	}
	action = {
		name = "Elect FDP coalition"
		ai_chance = 50
		command = { type = dissent value = -3 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = democratic value = 8 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = political_left value = 8 }
		command = { type = headofgovernment which = 630044 }
		command = { type = foreignminister which = 630015 }
		command = { type = armamentminister which = 630078 }
		command = { type = ministerofsecurity which = 630023 }
		command = { type = ministerofintelligence which = 630028 }
		}
	action = {
		name = "Elect CDU coalition"
		ai_chance = 50
		command = { type = dissent value = -3 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = democratic value = 8 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = political_left value = 3 }

		command = { type = foreignminister which = 630013 }
		command = { type = armamentminister which = 630048 }

event = {
	id = 92000008
	random = no
	country = GER
	date = { day = 10 month = august year = 1962 }
	name = "Presidential Election 1962"
	desc = "The role of President was a ceremonial one, although he did have the power to rule by decree in an emergency. The election of a president opposed to the ruling government could force a change of ministers in order to bring them more into line with the president's ideology."
	style = 2
	picture = "Reichstag"
	trigger = {
			event = 92000000 #Military Junta
	}
	action = {
		name = "Elect FDP candidate"
		ai_chance = 40
		command = { type = dissent value = -3 }
		command = { type = headofstate which = 630051 }
		}
	action = {
		name = "Elect CDU candidate"
		ai_chance = 60
		command = { type = dissent value = -3 }
      		command = { type = domestic which = political_left value = -1 }
		command = { type = headofstate which = 630041 }
		}
}

# Prussian Esprit du Corps

event = {
	id = 1000005
	country = GER
	random = no

	trigger = {
			event = 92000000 #Military Junta
			event = 90000556 #Peace in the Reich
			government = democratic
			atwar = no
	}

	name = "EVT_1000005_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_1000005_DESC"
	style = 2
	picture = "Wehrmacht_Parade"

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1950 }
	offset = 30
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1963 }

	action_a = {
		name = "EVT_1000005a"
			ai_chance = 100
 				command = { type = morale which = land value = 1 }
				command = { type = max_organization which = infantry value = 1 }
				command = { type = max_organization which = armor value = 1 }
				command = { type = max_organization which = motorized value = 1 }
				command = { type = max_organization which = mechanized value = 1 }
				command = { type = max_organization which = bergsjaeger value = 1 }
				command = { type = max_organization which = paratrooper value = 1 }
				command = { type = max_organization which = hq value = 1 }

    			    command = { type = desert_defense which = infantry value = 1 }
    			    command = { type = mountain_defense which = infantry value = 1 }
   			      	command = { type = hill_defense which = infantry value = 1 }
   			      	command = { type = forest_defense which = infantry value = 1 }
           			command = { type = swamp_defense which = infantry value = 1 }
           			command = { type = urban_defense which = infantry value = 1 }
    			    command = { type = desert_attack which = infantry value = 1 }
    			    command = { type = mountain_attack which = infantry value = 1 }
   			      	command = { type = hill_attack which = infantry value = 1 }
   			      	command = { type = forest_attack which = infantry value = 1 }
           			command = { type = swamp_attack which = infantry value = 1 }
           			command = { type = urban_attack which = infantry value = 1 }

    			    command = { type = desert_defense which = armor value = 1 }

#Economy
event = {
	id = 9876525
	random = no
	country = GER
	trigger = {
			event = 92000000 #Military Junta
			event = 90000556 #Peace in the Reich
			government = democratic
			atwar = no

		OR = {
			##ideology = fascist
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			ideology = social_conservative
			ideology = market_liberal
			ideology = social_liberal
		}
	}
	name = "Austerity vs. Stimulus"
	desc = "Should the new government try a New Deal style stimulus package or going to an harsh austerity programme?"
	style = 2
	picture = "new_deal"
	date = { day = 0 month = january year = 1951 }
	offset = 25
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1964 }
	action = {
		name = "Stimulate the economy"
		command = { type = dissent value = -5 }
		command = { type = money value = -1000 }
	}
	action = {
		name = "More austerity"
		command = { type = dissent value = 10 }
		command = { type = money value = 1000 }
	}
}

#Social Reform
event = {
	id = 9876526
	random = no
	country = GER
	trigger = {
				event = 92000000 #Military Junta
			event = 90000556 #Peace in the Reich
			government = democratic
			atwar = no

		OR = {
			#ideology = fascist
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			ideology = social_conservative
			ideology = market_liberal
			ideology = social_liberal
		}
	}
	name = "Welfare Reform"
	desc = "The New Governemnt are proposing the expansion of social housing and an increase in unemployed benefits. The question is, can we afford it?"
	style = 2
	picture = "fatherland\wehrmacht_germany"
	date = { day = 0 month = january year = 1951 }
	offset = 25
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1964 }
	action = {
		name = "We must help the needy!"
		command = { type = dissent value = -5 }
		command = { type = money value = -750 }
	}
	action = {
		name = "We can't afford it!"
		command = { type = dissent value = 5 }
	}
}

# Constitutional reform
event = {
	id = 9876530
	random = no
	country = GER
	trigger = {
			event = 92000000 #Military Junta
			event = 90000556 #Peace in the Reich
			government = democratic
			atwar = no

		OR = {
			#ideology = fascist
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			ideology = social_conservative
			ideology = market_liberal
			ideology = social_liberal
		}
	}
	name = "Constitutional Reform"
	desc = "The New Governement has been working on a package of constitutional reforms to make Germany a freer, more open society. As well as granting more civil liberties, What should we do?"
	style = 2
	picture = "fatherland\wehrmacht_germany"
	date = { day = 0 month = january year = 1951 }
	offset = 25
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1964 }

	action = {
	ai_chance = 80
		name = "Pass the bill"
		#command = { type = domestic which = democratic value = 1 }
		command = { type = domestic which = freedom value = 3 }
		#command = { type = domestic which = political_left value = 9 }
		command = { type = dissent value = 2 }
		command = { type = money value = -100 }
	}
	action = {
	ai_chance = 20
		name = "Block the bill"
		command = { type = dissent value = 2 }
		command = { type = domestic which = freedom value = -2 }
	}
}

# Public investment
event = {
    	id = 9876533
		random = no
    	country = GER
	trigger = {
			event = 92000000 #Military Junta
			event = 90000556 #Peace in the Reich
			government = democratic
			atwar = no

		OR = {
			#ideology = fascist
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			ideology = social_conservative
			ideology = market_liberal
			ideology = social_liberal
		}
	}
	date = { day = 0 month = january year = 1951 }
	offset = 25
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1964 }
    name = "Public Investment"
    desc = "The New Governemnt feels able to launch a new public spending plan which involves consdierable investment in various areas of the economy. The key question is, should we focus our investment in industry, public services, infrastructure or technology?"
	style = 2
    Picture = "public_jobs"
	decision_picture = "decision_public_jobs"
    action = {
            name = "Invest in Industry"
		command = { type = event which = 9000040 where = -1 when = 60 }
		command = { type = event which = 9000040 where = -1 when = 60 }
		command = { type = event which = 9000040 where = -1 when = 60 }
		command = { type = dissent value = -1 }
		command = { type = money value = -5000 }
		command = { type = industrial_modifier which = total value = 1.5 }
		command = { type = domestic which = free_market value = -1 }
    }
    action = {
            name = "Invest in Public Services"
		command = { type = dissent value = -10 }
		command = { type = money value = -1000 }
    }
    action = {
            name = "Invest in Infrastructure"
		command = { type = construct which = infrastructure where = -1 value = 10 }
		command = { type = construct which = infrastructure where = -1 value = 10 }
		command = { type = construct which = infrastructure where = -1 value = 10 }
		command = { type = dissent value = -1 }
		command = { type = money value = -3000 }
		command = { type = tc_mod value = 3 }
		command = { type = domestic which = free_market value = -1 }
    }
    action = {
            name = "Invest in Technology"
		command = { type = research_mod value = 2.5 }
		command = { type = dissent value = -1 }
		command = { type = money value = -2000 }
		command = { type = domestic which = free_market value = -1 }
    }
}
# Comprehensive education
event = {
    	id = 9876000
   	random = no
    	country = GER
	trigger = {
			event = 92000000 #Military Junta
			event = 90000556 #Peace in the Reich
			government = democratic
			atwar = no

		OR = {
			#ideology = fascist
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			ideology = social_conservative
			ideology = market_liberal
			ideology = social_liberal
		}
	}
	date = { day = 0 month = january year = 1951 }
	offset = 25
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1964 }
    name = "Education Reform"
    desc = "Rather than children being sent to different schools at the age of 11 based on ability, a comprehensive system would see all children going to one school to do the same qualifications. Those on the left see this as fairer and the split at 11 being too early to decide a child's future. On the other hand, middle class parents would not be happy to see their children not achieve their potential by being dragged down by the less able."
    style = 2
    picture = "fatherland\wehrmacht_germany"
    action = {
            name = "The same opportunities for all! Bring in comprehensives!"
		command = { type = dissent value = 4 }
		command = { type = money value = -250 }
		command = { type = domestic which = freedom value = 2 }
    }
	action = {
		name = "Not all children are the same! Retain the status quo!"
		command = { type = dissent value = 2 }
		command = { type = domestic which = freedom value = -2 }
	}
}









































# The 2nd Kulturkampf
event = {
	id = 9876001
	random = no
	country = GER
	trigger = {
			event = 92000000 #Military Junta
			event = 90000556 #Peace in the Reich
			government = democratic
			atwar = no

		OR = {
			#ideology = fascist
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			ideology = social_conservative
			ideology = market_liberal
			ideology = social_liberal
		}
	}
	name = "The 2nd Kulturkampf"
	desc = "In the 1870s, the Kaiser waged a war against the influence of the catholic church in Germany, the so called Kulturkampf. Now that the Catholic Zentrum party are in a strong position, they are seeking to reassert christain values on the seemingly permissive Weimar society. Critics argue that it will be a backward step whilst supporters say the deparavity of Weimar culture is out of control. What should we do?"
	style = 2
	picture = "fatherland\wehrmacht_germany"
	date = { day = 0 month = january year = 1933 }
	offset = 120
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1964 }
	action = {
		name = "Back to traditional values!"
		command = { type = domestic which = freedom value = -2 }
		command = { type = dissent value = 2 }
	}
	action = {
		name = "No, we are a progressive, modern nation!"
		command = { type = dissent value = 2 }
		command = { type = domestic which = freedom value = 2 }
	}
}

# Tax cuts
event = {
    	id = 9876002
   	random = no
    	country = GER
    	decision = {
				money = 1000
			OR = {
				headofgovernment = 310

		}
	}
	decision_trigger = {
			money = 3000
			OR = {
				headofgovernment = 310
		}
	}
	trigger = {
			event = 92000000 #Military Junta
			event = 90000556 #Peace in the Reich
			government = democratic
			atwar = no

			OR = {
				headofgovernment = 310
		}
	}
	date = { day = 0 month = january year = 1933 }
	offset = 30
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1964 }
    name = "Tax Cuts"
    desc = "One of the ways to stimulate much needed economic growth could be tax cuts. Zentrum are keen to deliver the tax cuts they promised to the electorate however there is debate within the coalition. The SPD think we should focus on spending to get grwoth, whilst the liberals are in favour of putting money in people's pockets through lower taxation. What should we do?"
    style = 2
    Picture = "issue_currency"
	decision_picture = "decision_money_devaluation"
    action = {
            name = "Cut Taxes"
		command = { type = dissent value = -5 }
		command = { type = money value = -3000 }
		command = { type = industrial_modifier which = total value = 1 }
		command = { type = domestic which = free_market value = 1 }
    }
}
# Religious Schools programme
event = {
	id = 9876003
	random = no
	country = GER

	trigger = {
				event = 92000000 #Military Junta
			event = 90000556 #Peace in the Reich
			government = democratic
			atwar = no

		government = democratic
		headofgovernment = 310
	}
	name = "Religious Schools Programme"
	desc = "Religious schools has always been an issue close to the hearts of the Catholic Zentrum party. Given their recent electoral victory, Zentrum leader and chancellor Joseph Wirth has brought forward a new programme to dramatically increase the number of church schools. In their eyes, this will reassert the important position the church holds in society. Zentrum's SPD coalition partners are not so keen, they see it as a step in the wrong direction. What should we do?"
	style = 2
	picture = "fatherland\wehrmacht_germany"
	date = { day = 25 month = september year = 1937 }
	action = {
		name = "Give our children a traditional education!"
		command = { type = domestic which = freedom value = -1 }
		command = { type = dissent value = -2 }
		command = { type = money value = -300 }
	}
	action = {
		name = "No, this is a backward step!"
		command = { type = dissent value = 1 }
		command = { type = domestic which = freedom value = 1 }
	}
}
# Public Sector strikes
event = {
	id = 9876004
	random = no
	country = GER
	trigger = {
		government = democratic
		headofgovernment = 310
		atwar = no
	}
	name = "Public Sector Strikes"
	desc = "Public Sector workers are unhappy about recent salary cuts implemented by the current government and have decided to organise mass strikes. The left of the party is advocating negotiation and compromise but the right is pushing for a tough stance against trouble makers. What should we do?"
	style = 2
	picture = "strikesruspetro"
	date = { day = 3 month = november year = 1941 }
	action = {
		name = "Negotiate a settlement"
		command = { type = domestic which = political_left value = 1 }
		command = { type = dissent value = -2 }
		command = { type = money value = -500 }
		command = { type = headofgovernment which = 310 }
	}
	action = {
		name = "Don't back down!"
		command = { type = dissent value = 5 }
		command = { type = domestic which = political_left value = -1 }
	}
}
# Free markets economics
event = {
    	id = 9876005
   	random = no
    	country = GER
    	decision = {
			OR = {
				headofgovernment = 630002

		}
	}
	decision_trigger = {
			OR = {
				headofgovernment = 630002
		}
	}
	trigger = {
			OR = {
				headofgovernment = 630002
		}
	}
	date = { day = 0 month = january year = 1933 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1964 }
    name = "Free Market economics"
    desc = "The right-wing CDU have promised that the way to rebuild the country after the war is free market economics. By reducing taxes and regulation, they hope to encourage growth and wealth creation. Those on the left see these methods as simply a way to create greed and inequality. Should we adopt this economic theory?"
    style = 2
    Picture = "issue_currency"
	decision_picture = "decision_issue_currency"
    action = {
            name = "Let the market rip!"
		command = { type = industrial_modifier which = total value = 2 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = free_market value = 10 }
		command = { type = dissent value = 3 }
    }
}

# Tax cuts
event = {
    	id = 9876007
   	random = no
    	country = GER
	trigger = {
				headofgovernment = 630002

	}
	date = { day = 1 month = april year = 1949 }
	offset = 30
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1964 }
    name = "Tax Cuts"
    desc = "One of the ways to stimulate much needed economic growth could be tax cuts. The CDU are keen to deliver the tax cuts they promised to the electorate however there is debate within the coalition. The FDP think we should focus on spending to get grwoth, whilst conservatives are in favour of putting money in people's pockets through lower taxation. What should we do?"
    style = 2
    Picture = "issue_currency"
    action = {
            name = "Cut Taxes"
		command = { type = dissent value = -5 }
		command = { type = money value = -3000 }
		command = { type = industrial_modifier which = total value = 1 }
		command = { type = domestic which = free_market value = 1 }
		command = { type = domestic which = political_left value = -1 }
    }
	action = {
		name = "We can't afford it!"
		command = { type = dissent value = 3 }
		command = { type = domestic which = free_market value = -1 }
		command = { type = domestic which = political_left value = 1 }
		command = { type = money value = 1000 }
	}
}
# health reform
event = {
    	id = 9876008
   	random = no
    	country = GER
	trigger = {
				headofgovernment = 630002

	}
	date = { day = 1 month = april year = 1953 }
	offset = 90
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1964 }
    name = "Healthcare Reform"
    desc = "Chancellor Adenauer has proposed drastic healthcare reform. The current system was instituted by Wel's coalition in the early 1930's and is therefore seen as out-of-date by the CDU. This bill would allow for private provision in healthcare and the reduction of state provided health cover. What should we do?"
    style = 2
    Picture = "issue_currency"
    action = {
            name = "Reform healthcare"
		command = { type = dissent value = 3 }
		command = { type = money value = -500 }
		command = { type = domestic which = free_market value = 1 }
		command = { type = domestic which = political_left value = -1 }
    }
	action = {
		name = "If it ain't broke, don't fix it!"
		command = { type = domestic which = free_market value = -1 }
		command = { type = domestic which = political_left value = 1 }
	}
}
# public spending cuts
event = {
    	id = 9876009
   	random = no
    	country = GER
	trigger = {
				headofgovernment = 630002

	}
	date = { day = 1 month = april year = 1957 }
	offset = 150
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1964 }
    name = "Public Spending Cuts"
    desc = "The new government's first budget has brought in a series of drastic public spending cuts. The conservatives believe that the state plays too big a role in the economy and that the market should be freer. These cuts will be very unpopular however! What should we do?"
    style = 2
    Picture = "issue_currency"
    action = {
            name = "Cut Public spending!"
		command = { type = dissent value = 10 }
		command = { type = money value = 6000 }
		command = { type = domestic which = free_market value = 1 }
		command = { type = domestic which = political_left value = -1 }
    }
	action = {
		name = "It's too unpopular!"
		command = { type = dissent value = -1 }
		command = { type = domestic which = free_market value = -1 }
		command = { type = domestic which = political_left value = 1 }
		command = { type = money value = -3000 }
	}
}

# Support for agriculture
event = {
    	id = 9876010
   	random = no
    	country = GER
	trigger = {
				headofgovernment = 273

	}
	date = { day = 1 month = april year = 1933 }
	offset = 60
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1964 }
    name = "Support for Agriculture"
    desc = "The DNVP are seeking to help revive the depressed agricultural sector with a series of subsidies and tax cuts. Although this will help poor farmers, it will most benefit the rich, aristocratic landowners that make up the DNVP's key supporters. What should we do?"
    style = 2
    picture = "fatherland\wehrmacht_germany"
    action = {
            name = "Help Farmers"
		command = { type = dissent value = -3 }
		command = { type = money value = -800 }
		command = { type = industrial_modifier which = total value = 0.5 }
    }
	action = {
		name = "We can't afford it!"
		command = { type = dissent value = 3 }
		command = { type = domestic which = free_market value = 1 }
		command = { type = money value = 800 }
	}
}

#### Mitteleuropa
event = {
    id = 1000718
    random = no
    country = GER 
	
    name = 1000718name
    desc = 1000718desc
    style = 2
    picture = "mitteleuropa"

	trigger = { 
		region = { region = Germany country = -3 data = 1 } 
		region = { region = Benelux country = -3 data = 1 } 		
		region = { region = Poland country = -3 data = 1 }
		region = { region = Belarus country = -3 data = 1 }
		region = { region = Ukraine country = -3 data = 1 }		
		event = 92000000
		random = 30
	} 
	
	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1954 }
	offset = 30
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

     action = {
		name = 1000718a
		command = { type = wartime_ic_mod value = 2 }
		command = { type = peacetime_ic_mod value = 2 }
	}
}
